comments.text:
+iloveyou75204 I notice something about you illuminati conspiracy theorist. 
While you theorist look at the beam in other people’s eyes, you fail to see 
the log in your own eyes.   What causes my eyebrow to be raised is that you 
theorist have a lot of holes in your character, as well.  I’ll tell you 
what is truly Satanic. What’s Satanic is illuminati theorist being racist 
towards Jews and falsely accusing them of being in the illuminati, which is 
what you illuminati theorist have done.  Illuminati theorist saying stuff 
like “I heard Alex Jones wife is in the illuminati” and Alex Jones is a 
secret government agent. I mean? Really? Alex Jones!? Alex Jones, one the 
most out spoken illuminati theorist, is now being accused of being in the 
illuminati. The confusion is just rampant and pathetic. One illuminati 
theorist girl said that God put 4 year old girls in Hell for having bad 
hair. So her whole testimony just went out the window with that one 
statement.  God does not put little kids in Hell. With out a doubt Alex 
Jones has to be demon possessed. You can just see the hatred steaming off 
his eyes. God said hating is the same as murder and will send you to hell. 
While Muslims chant that they are going to take over the world just like it 
warns about them in the Bible, you guys say nothing. Illuminati is not 
conquering nothing. The Bible indicates that the Anti Christ will come from 
Ishmael and rule the world for 7 years.  The demonic Quran says their 
Mahadi will rule the world for 7 years. You see the similarities? 
Yes,  you do love to accuse people of being in illuminati for the mystery 
and excitement of it all that or you psyched yourself into believing it. 
Likely, both.  Of course your not going to admit that. It’s just like a 
crazy person would never admit that  he is crazy.
comments.author: Emery Kennedy

comments.text:

the illuminati? Actually everyone in doesn't like it, they just go into it 
to become very famous and make more money beyond their talent. Of course MJ 
had a gift of talent that came from God, who said it came from the devil? 
Not me. MJ did use his talent for the devil though instead of God. Many 
stars are in the illuminati and are not extremely evil and demon possessed, 
lol. Like I said people don't join the illuminati because they like it or 
even want to be in it, they join it to make more money. MJ did all the 
illuminati hand signs, and everything, he was in it, sorry, whether you 
like it or not. But this doesn't mean MJ didn't love God or serve God, MJ 
did both. In his heart he really loved God, but had to participate in the 
illuminati like show the hand signs etc., because he signed the contract.

comments.text:
Am I the only guy who thinks the crows from the Wiz resemble the crows from 
Dumbo?﻿
comments.author: Philip Flynt

comments.text:
When I saw "Maleficent," about halfway through the first transition of that 
crow into a man, the still-frame reminded me of the crows on the "Wiz."
comments.author: Philip Flynt

comments.text:
Similar cultural significance to be honest. There were crows in Song Of The 
South as well. Spiritually they are associated as tricksters. So it is an 
extension of the "hooligan" archetype. The best is seeing that they are 
amongst the victims of Evamean in a subservient role.
comments.author: Maurice Charles

comments.text: Michaels voice is heaven i swear *-*﻿
comments.author: Jessica Kumar

comments.text:
I can't really listen to the recording; not because it's bad, but because 
his body language is so amazing for the performance. He is so desperate and 
he's holding back his voice for this track, and it makes you appreciate 
"Ease On Down The Road" just that much more! To hear him be joyful and 
watch him move accordingly!
comments.author: Maurice Charles
